name: Yes (Denixmis)
description:
This is my first game i am making right now and i have uploaded beta 1.0. I am proud of my game so far  and hope to make it even better at later updates. I am still very new to game development.

This is a fast-paced pixel art game with top down movement where you go through 10 rooms at a random order endlessly  until you die by hitting deadly blocks or time running out (more rooms in the later updates to make it less repetitive) .

Feedback and recommendations for the next update(beta 1.1) are highly appreciated.
